thread.section_title: Triple Crown Products Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Triple Crown Products | triplecrownproducts.com
thread.title: Lisa Craib McMillan
thread.title_full: Triple Crown Products reviewed by Lisa Craib McMillan

author: Lisa Craib McMillan
title: Lisa Craib McMillan
text:
Great customer service.
I find the the Jesus sign on the website is inappropriate and off putting for a business. And the God Bless America when they answer the phone is also kind of off putting for a business. Can't we just be professional and leave the personal beliefs at the door.
If you have to wear your patriotism and religious beliefs on your forehead, it just reflects insecurity, lack of inclusion and intolerance of those who don't share those views. Dignity is more dignified when understated.
